mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productstock (price, storeNumber, amount, product_id, depot_id,auditTime) VALUES (#{price}, #{storeNumber}, #{amount}, #{product.id}, #{depot.id},#{auditTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE productstock SET price = #{price}, storeNumber = #{storeNumber}, amount = #{amount}, auditTime = #{auditTime}, product_id = #{product.id}, depot_id = #{depot.id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, price, storeNumber, amount, auditTime, product_id, depot_id FROM productstock WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, price, storeNumber, amount, auditTime, product_id, depot_id FROM productstock

SELECT ps.id, ps.price, ps.storeNumber, ps.amount, ps.auditTime, product.id product_id, product.name product_name, depot.id depot_id, depot.name depot_name FROM productstock ps JOIN product product ON ps.product_id = product.id JOIN depot depot ON ps.depot_id = depot.id WHERE ps.product_id = #{productId} AND ps.depot_id = #{depotId}
